channel.title: Adsense ban triggers
channel.description:
I got banned from adsense like 5 years ago for being a moron and clicking my ads, but I want to re-register. I'm going to uni soon so I'll have a completely new address, new phone number and an IP based 300 miles away. I'll also show ads from a different site than the banned one. I can set up a new bank account, too.
Will I still be able to register under the same name? I'm sure they wouldn't have a persons name as a ban trigger because there are so many people with the same name, but everyone I ask says you have to use someone else's name. Is this true?

item.title: Adsense ban triggers
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

ah, then you probably won’t have any issues

Read full topic

item.title: Adsense ban triggers
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I never got asked for that when I registered the first time, probably because I’m in the UK? I remember signing my name on the bottom of a form, agreeing that I’m based outside the USA and something to do with not paying tax.

Read full topic

item.title: Adsense ban triggers
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

not sure about the name, but i’m guessing it probably wont let you use the same ssn.

Read full topic
